org.neo4j

Class SearchQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.SearchQuery

  • public class SearchQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Neo4J Team The search query class. It is used to query the graph DB and retrieve results in JSON format.

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonFromMessageList

        public org.json.simple.JSONArray getJsonFromMessageList(java.lang.String relType,
                                               long startTime,
                                               long endTime)
        This method directs a cypher query to a REST service. The REST service responds with the matching nodes' information. The response is filtered to construct a JSON format that can be parsed by the d3.js team.
        Parameters:
        relType - The type of relationship that has been queried
        startTime - the start time mentioned in the query
        endTime - the end time mentioned in the query
        Returns:
        JSONArray teh result of the query in the JSON format

      • writeJsonToFile

        public void writeJsonToFile(org.json.simple.JSONArray jObj)
        This method writes a JSONArray to a text file. The JSONArray is the one that is constructed after a cypher query is forwarded to the REST service. The cypher query asks the graph database for a set of nodes that match the specified conditions. The response from the REST service is then converted to a JSONArray format.
        Parameters:
        jObj - the argument is the final JSONArray that needs to be written to a text file

      • query_new

        public java.util.Map<org.json.simple.JSONObject,org.json.simple.JSONArray> query_new(java.lang.String originalQuery)
        This method takes a list of messageIDs as input. The messageIDs are generated and forwarded to this method by the Lucene API. Each messageID corresponds to the tweet that matches the search parameters selected by the user in the Lucene user interface.
        Parameters:
        originalQuery - List of message IDs generated by the Lucene API
        Returns:
        Map a map that contains all relevant node information in the form of JSONObjects
